title: Doubly Graded Crossover Specials - More Reductions
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Doubly Graded Crossover Specials - More Reductions
posts.post_content:
Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a doubly graded card.
Several years ago I took the risk and submitted my 20 GAI slabs for
crossover after cracking them out of their GAI tombs.
All 20 received numerical numerical grades from SGC.  Only five of the twenty remain in my possession.

Overall the SGC grades were slightly lower, but these five cards received 24.5 GAI grade points as a group and also received 24.5 SGC grade points.

The last five are offered for sale.  As an added incentive, if you are a serious buyer and guess correctly the GAI grade after we have agreed on a price, you will get 10% off the agreed on price.  Don't guess until you have committed to buy the card.

Camnitz Hands over Head - $180

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10607/camnitz-hands-over-head[/IMG]

Joe Dunn Brooklyn - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10591/dunn-joe[/IMG]

Fromme Pitching - $140

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10592/fromme-pitching[/IMG]

Oakes - $250

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10598/oakes[/IMG]

Wright - $OLD

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10604/wright[/IMG]

Asking prices are based on the SGC grades and not the original GAI grades.

Good luck.;)
Hey Frank, I’ll take Wright. PM coming
Giving these cards another chance to be yours.
